rare.name: QUICKLOAD CHAMBER
rare.description: Reloading within 6m of an enemy adds 20% of Max Ammo as extra Ammo.

epic.name: COMPETITIVE ANALYSIS
epic.description: Deal 15% increased primary fire damage to enemies in the Damage role.

rare.name: BLACKWATCH TECH
rare.description: [Deadeye] eliminations reduce [Flashbang] max cooldown by 10%, up to 40% for the round.

rare.name: WANTED POSTER
rare.description: [Deadeye] eliminations reward extra 500 Stadium Cash each.

epic.name: FRANKIE'S FIXER
epic.description: Heal 10 Life for each Ammo loaded using [Combat Roll].

epic.name: EAGLE EYE
epic.description: Take 25% less damage from enemies farther than 12m.

powers.title: BULLSEYE
powers.description: Critical hit reduces [Combat Roll]'s cooldown by 2s.

powers.title: DEAD MAN WALKING
powers.description: Eliminating an enemy you've recently critically hit grants 1 Max Ammo for the round.

powers.title: FULL HOUSE
powers.description: For each Ammo available, [Peacekeeper] 's primary fire gains 1 % increased damage, up to 25%.

powers.title: QUICK DRAW
powers.description: After using [Combat Roll], [Peacekeeper]'s next primary fire can auto-aim within 9m while under cooldown.

powers.title: THINK FLASHT
powers.description: When you start a [Combat Roll], leave a [Flashbang] behind.

powers.title: BARREL ROLL
powers.description: [Combat Roll] takes you 50% further and deals 65 damage to enemies.

powers.title: JUST ROLL WITH IT
powers.description: During [Combat Roll], prevent all incoming damage. After [Combat Roll] ends, heal 30% of your Life over 3s.

powers.title: FLASH IN THE PAIN
powers.description: Eliminating an enemy recently damaged by [Flashbang] grants 15% Ultimate Charge.

powers.title: HOT POTATO
powers.description: [Flashbang] adds 3 extra Ammo on hit until [Peacekeeper] is reloaded.

powers.title: EASY RIDER
powers.description: While using [Deadeye], gain 100 Overhealth and 25% Move Speed.

powers.title: SUNRISE
powers.description: Using [Deadeye] slows all visible enemies by 35% for 1.5s.
